academy.name: Renaissance Academy
academy.description: Unlock your potential with modern skills and launch your career with confidence.

contact.address: Tashkent city, Yunusabad district, Amir Temur Street 129B

courses.name: Programming
courses.description: Learn front-end and back-end programming with essential technologies.

instructor.name: Ivanov Nikolai
instructor.bio: A developer and mentor with 10 years of experience.

process: Project creation and working with GitHub

courses.name: Design
courses.description: Fundamentals of graphic design and UI/UX using Photoshop, Figma, and Illustrator.

instructor.name: Kamilova Nargiza
instructor.bio: A renowned graphic designer and UI/UX specialist.

process: Hands-on practice with Photoshop and Illustrator

courses.name: Logistics Brokerage
courses.description: Learn theoretical and practical knowledge in logistics brokerage.

instructor.name: Jorayev Akbar
instructor.bio: A specialist with 15 years of experience in the logistics field.

process: Principles of working as a broker

courses.name: Video Editing and Special Effects
courses.description: Learn video editing, special effects, and animation using Adobe Premiere Pro and After Effects.

instructor.name: Smirnova Nadya
instructor.bio: A professional video editor and animator.

courses.name: Marketing
courses.description: Basics of digital marketing, SEO, SEM, and social media marketing.

instructor.name: Andrey Kuznetsov
instructor.bio: A marketing specialist with 10 years of experience.

faq.question: What is Renaissance Academy?
faq.answer: An educational center providing knowledge in modern fields.

faq.question: What can I learn?
faq.answer: Programming, design, marketing, and other IT fields.

faq.question: What happens after my trial ends?
faq.answer: You will be admitted to the course based on your results.

faq.question: Can I teach at Renaissance Academy?
faq.answer: Yes, if you are a qualified specialist.

form.title: We will help you choose!
form.description: If you have any questions about the course or don't know what to choose, leave your number - we will answer all your questions.
